title: SCTMIST Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Senior Project Engineer Post
description: The Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Project Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the SCTMIST Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, applicatio...
